concept.title: Setting cellular data preferences
concept.shortdesc: Use these preferences to determine the behavior for meetings when not on a WiFi connection. By default, meetings are joined in audio-only mode and you cannot download or play meeting recordings when using a cellular connection. This is to minimize data plan usage.

conbody.p:
To set cellular data preferences, from the menu tap Settings AV . You can set the following options for how you participate in a meeting and handle meeting recordings.
Stream over WiFi only Specify if you participate in meetings using audio only. You cannot see other participant videos.
Download over WiFi only Enable to download meeting recordings only when using WiFi.
Playback over WiFi only Enable to replay meeting recordings only when using WiFi.
